title: Ochre Phoenix Bird. A Legend
provenance_text:
Carl-Henning Pedersen [1913-2007], Copenhagen, Denmark, until December 17, 1968 [1]; purchased from the artist by Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1968 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was received at the museum on September 24, 1968; it was included in "Exhibition of Paintings, Watercolors, and Drawings by Carl-Henning Pedersen" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October - December 1968 (no. 60, illustrated in the catalogue.) 
[2]. The painting was accessioned on December 17, 1968.
